title: Spaghetti
brief_description: Created as part of Victoria University Multimedia’s After Effects course, this short piece shows, through simple animation, live action and video - the process of making pasta with tomato sauce.
description: Created as part of Victoria University Multimedia’s After Effects course, this short piece shows, through simple animation, live action and video - the process of making pasta with tomato sauce.
